hero.title: Peace of Mind
hero.subtitle: For Those Who Live Alone
hero.description: A simple, reliable app that helps friends and family monitor each other's well-being through daily check-ins. If you miss check-ins for three consecutive days, your emergency contact is automatically notified.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Simple, reliable features designed for peace of mind

dailyCheckIns.title: Daily Check-Ins
dailyCheckIns.description: Simply open the app each day to confirm you're safe. Receive push notifications to remind you to check in. Quick, easy, and non-intrusive.

automaticAlerts.title: Automatic Alerts
automaticAlerts.description: If you miss check-ins for three consecutive days, your emergency contact is automatically notified.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your data stays private. No tracking, no unnecessary data collection, just peace of mind.

simpleReliable.title: Simple & Reliable
simpleReliable.description: Clean interface with no distractions. Designed to be simple and dependable when it matters most.

emergencyContact.title: Emergency Contact
emergencyContact.description: Set up your trusted contact who will be notified if something seems wrong.

worksOffline.title: Works Offline
worksOffline.description: Check-ins are recorded offline and synced when you're back online. Always reliable.

seeItInAction.title: See It in Action
seeItInAction.subtitle: Experience the simplicity and peace of mind Between Days provides

dailyCheckIn.title: Daily Check-In
dailyCheckIn.description: Simple, one-tap check-in to let loved ones know you're safe

easyOnboarding.title: Easy Onboarding
easyOnboarding.description: Get started quickly with a simple, guided setup process

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your name, emergency contact, and language preferences

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you
